infractions.Violation Summary: The owner or agent tenant or manager fails to maintain building in safe manner Structural integrety not maintained Building not free of pests Adequate heat ventilation and lighting not provided Not free of nuisances/hazards
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: The owner or agent tenant or manager fails to maintain building in safe manner Structural integrety not maintained Building not free of pests Adequate heat ventilation and lighting not provided Not free of nuisances/hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Adulterated food observed being served Food contact surfaces observed not manufactured as required Food is not protected from cross contamination at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Water system not designed and/or installed to provide adequate water supply to all fixtures
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Cutting boards observed constructed of inappropriate materials Boards observed not maintained at time of inspection

infractions.Violation Summary: Floors in comercial building properly not constructed not maintained in good repair unclean
Walls and ceiling in comercial building not properly constructed not maintained in good repair unclean
At time of inspection it was determined that tools were improperly used Surfaces observed unsealed or in disrepair at time of inspection
School-based child care program fails to conduct daily health assessment of attending children
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
